testcase.classname: This feature will validate flight booking functionality
testcase.name: Verify departure and destination dropdowns have all expected cities
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to flight booking application..........................passed Then User validates "Paris,Philadelphia,Boston,Portland,San Diego,Mexico City,São Paolo" and "Buenos Aires,Rome,London,Berlin,New York,Dublin,Cairo" cities available.passed

testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to flight booking application..........................passed When user selects "Paris" and "Rome" city...................................passed And user choose flight to reserve ticket....................................passed Then user validates flight header message "Paris" and "Rome" city...........passed
